animeDescription: It's about an ordinary office worker Fumiyama Fumio, who gains self-confidence by the advices of an Indian god, Ganesha.
animeStaff: [['Daichi Akitarou', ['Director']], ['Tanaka Kazuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Tagashira Shinobu', ['Character Design']], ['Matsumura Masahiro', ['Editing']]]
